summary: Game platform in Nepali featuring verified cash tournaments with wallet top-up and prize withdrawals via IME Pay and Khalti.

existing_features.title: Add Internet Identity authentication and a basic role model (regular user vs admin) so admins can verify tournaments and approve top-ups/withdrawals.

Implement a verified tournaments system: create tournaments, mark tournaments as verified (admin-only), allow users to join verified tournaments, record results, and distribute prizes to winnersâ€™ in-app wallets.
Add an in-app wallet with transaction history to support tournament entry fees, winnings credits, and admin-approved top-ups.
Implement wallet top-up requests: users can create a top-up request; admins can approve/mark it as paid; wallet balance updates only on admin approval.

Implement tournament winnings withdrawal requests: users can request withdrawal of available wallet funds, select IME Pay or Khalti, provide payout identifier details, and track status; admins can approve/reject/mark completed.
Make the app localized for Nepali: default UI language Nepali across all screens, with a simple localization structure so text can be maintained consistently.

Create core screens and navigation: (1) Home/Dashboard, (2) Tournaments list + tournament detail/join, (3) Wallet (balance + transactions), (4) Top-up request, (5) Withdraw request + status list, (6) Admin area for verification/results/top-up approvals/withdraw approvals.
Define a coherent visual theme for the entire UI (colors, typography, spacing, components styling) and apply it consistently across all screens; avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Add generated static image assets and use them in the UI (e.g., app header/logo and a landing/hero background), served from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Verified tournaments system (tournament creation/verification, participation, results, prize distribution)
Wallet top-up support (add funds to participate in tournaments)

imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Flat emblem-style logo with a trophy and subtle Nepali pattern motif, warm orange/charcoal palette (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero background illustration showing a competitive tournament vibe with abstract arena lights, warm orange/charcoal palette (hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)

generatedImages.description: Flat emblem-style logo with a trophy and subtle Nepali pattern motif, warm orange/charcoal palette
Wide hero background illustration showing a competitive tournament vibe with abstract arena lights, warm orange/charcoal palette

projectName: Nepali cash-tournament game platform with verified tournaments, wallet top-ups, and withdrawals via IME Pay/Khalti
